settings.ft-1: Advanced productivity-tech that supercharges your day & helps you maintain your morning energy, all day.
settings.ft-text-1:
• 300lbs lifting capacity
  • Linak DL6 plus - Dual Motors,
    3-stage lifting columns
  • Height range: 560mm(22")
    to 1210mm(47.5")
  • Column travel speed: 60mm/s
  • Low noise levels
  • Anti-collision PEIZO sensor
  • Quick and easy installation

settings.pop_sub_heading: And see which size is right for you

settings.l-text:
The Charcoal Desk uses sensors and
predictable data to find your brain's
natural restorative windows. Take
breaks at these specific times, and
these calibrated breaks will reset your
brain and help you maintain your 9 am
energy, all day.
settings.l-text-mobile: The Charcoal Desk uses sensors and predictable data to find your brain's natural restorative windows. Take breaks at these specific times, and these calibrated breaks will reset your brain and help you maintain your 9 am energy, all day.

settings.l-text: The desk syncs with how your brain works
settings.l-text-mobile: The desk syncs with how your brain works
settings.l-text-2: Uses sensors to observe your work habits
settings.l-text-mobile-2: Uses sensors to observe your work habits
settings.l-text-3: Tells you the best times to take breaks and the app helps you make this a habit
settings.l-text-mobile-3: Tells you the best times to take breaks and the app helps you make this a habit

settings.accordion_title: The Impact of Caliberated breaks and sleep on cognitive performance : An EEG based Investigation
The Efficacy of Recovery Breaks During Critical Healing Windows

settings.heading:
AT THE PUSH OF
A BUTTON
settings.heading-mobile: AT THE PUSH<nbr> OF A BUTTON</nbr>

settings.text:
Take everything up a notch with the ultimate
standing desk experience. The Charcoal Desk has
the world’s finest lifting columns - the Linak Dl6
Plus, meticulously crafted in Denmark. These are
super fast, three-stage, dual-motor columns with
the ability to save presets, an integrated
collision sensor, and much more.
settings.text-mobile: Take everything up a notch with the ultimate standing desk experience. The Charcoal Desk has the world’s finest lifting columns - the Linak Dl6 Plus, meticulously crafted in Denmark. These are super fast, three-stage, dual-motor columns with the ability to save presets, an integrated collision sensor, and much more.

settings.title: Revolutionary Productivity Device
settings.text: The brain has a stress threshold; exceeding it causes burnout and slow recovery. But if stress remains within the limit, the brain recovers quickly even when tired. The desk finds these critical recovery points for you using presence sensors and pre-loaded data based on EEG scans. Forget burnouts, you’ll work like it’s morning all-day

settings.title: Exceptional Build Quality
settings.text: The Charcoal Desk is built like a consumer product without any of the limitations of furniture manufacturing. The result is a precisely engineered product made possible through multiple stages of precision CNC milling and laser cutting. You can expect a build quality that's never before seen in the furniture industry.

settings.title: Standing Desk Redefined
settings.text: With an Italian-made tabletop material that's more premium than Solid Wood, the highest quality motors and columns from Denmark, and custom silicon molded buttons with the perfect feel and tactile feedback, the Charcoal Desk is a league ahead of any standing desk out there

settings.title: Revolutionary Interface
settings.text: The desk talks to you through a truly incredible user interface - the Activity Lamp. It's a single dot of light that subtly changes color to a warm yellow when it's time for a break and progresses to a mean orange when you really shouldn't delay your recovery. It's simplicity itself.

Say hello to Crystal Acrylic, the
ultimate desk surface crafted in Italy.
Its velvet-smooth texture is so
amazing, that you'll want to keep
your hands on it.

It’s also far, far tougher than any
other desk surface. With a shore
hardness of D-94, it’s highly resistant
to scratches and will always look new.
settings.text-mobile:
Say hello to Crystal Acrylic, the ultimate desk surface crafted in Italy. Its velvet-smooth texture is so amazing, that you'll want to keep your hands on it.

It’s also far, far tougher than any other desk surface. With a shore hardness of D-94, it’s highly resistant to scratches and will always look new.
